text: Both my sons are attending this preschool. The principal and teachers are nice and friendly. My kids like them and there is noticeable improvement in my kids after attending the school. Thanks for being kind & keep up with the good work! :)
The teachers are friendly and easy to communicate regards to the well being and educations of my kids.
Always making huge impact on my kids learning journey, all my 4 kids went to bright kids and i can never be happier that i chose this school.

Safe place to care my grand children.
My kids enjoy going to the childcare. Especially my second granddaughter.
My child has been with Bright Kids @ JW since infant care, like the environment and teachers.
